title: Ep. 631 The Closing Act of the Biggest Scandal in American History
description:
Here’s CNN’s original explanation for why the Trump team was being spied on.

Here’s The NY Times new reason that the Trump team was being spied on.

Here’s Fusion GPS and CNN’s alternate reasons why the Trump team was being spied on.

Here’s a fascinating timeline of this sordid tale.
